summary: This bill, the Child Care Access Means Parents In Schools Reauthorization Act (CCAMPIS), amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reauthorize and expand the CCAMPIS program. It authorizes the Secretary to award grants to eligible institutions of higher education to provide child care services to student parents. The bill outlines grant amounts, eligible uses of funds (including establishing campus-based child care and providing subsidies), application requirements, reporting requirements, and non-discrimination provisions. It also prioritizes programs that leverage local resources and use sliding fee scales.
